sect2.title: Modulegroups

entry.para: The modulegroups button bar give you quick access to the set of modules available in darktable, each one categorized into groups, see the specification below.

sect2.para: Here follows descriptions of the module groups available:

row.entry: Shows the list of current active modules for the processed image
Modules you have marked as favorites using "more modules" will show up here
The basic group of modules that is frequently used when processing raw, such as exposure, temperature etc.
These modules does only work with the image tone, like levels, tonemap etc.
Modules that just affects colors, such as color correction, vibrance etc.
Modules that makes corrections to the image, denoise, ca correction etc.
Modules with a more artistic output, vignetting, softening etc.
